analysis.description:
Reentrancy in DetherSale.allocateTokens (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#957-984):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(contributor,contributions[contributor].mul(DECIMALS_MULTIPLIER).div(weiPerDTH)) (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#972-976)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contributions (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#979)
empty in ERC223BasicToken.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#847) is a local variable never initialiazed

DisbursementHandler.withdraw (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#350-362) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(to,withdrawAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#361-362)

Sale.distributeTimelockedTokens (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#698-705) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(disbursementHandler,tokenAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#704-705)

DetherSale.allocateTokens (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#957-984) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(contributor,contributions[contributor].mul(DECIMALS_MULTIPLIER).div(weiPerDTH)) (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#972-976)
	-token.mint(owner,remaining) (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#983)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#984)

DetherSale.presaleAllocateTokens (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#988-993) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(presaleAddress,PRESALE_WEI.mul(DECIMALS_MULTIPLIER).div(weiPerDTH)) (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#992-993)

DisbursementHandler.setupDisbursement (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#320-328) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < timestamp) (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#324-325)

DisbursementHandler.changeTimestamp (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#337-348) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < timestamp) (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#342-343)

DisbursementHandler.calcMaxWithdraw (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#364-386) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > temp[i].timestamp (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#378-382)

TimedStateMachine.startConditions (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#525-534) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- start != 0 && block.timestamp > start (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#531-532)

TimedStateMachine.setStageStartTime (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#538-545) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(timestamp > block.timestamp) (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#544)

Sale.setupDone (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#634-643) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < _startTime) (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#640-641)

DetherSale.getContributionLimit (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#1003-1016) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- whitelistingPeriod = block.timestamp - saleStartTime <= WHITELISTING_DURATION (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#1009-1013)
	- ! whitelisted[userAddress] || block.timestamp < saleStartTime (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#1007-1009)

ERC223BasicToken.transfer uses assembly (/unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#801-823)
	- /unique_contracts/0x5adc961d6ac3f7062d2ea45fefb8d8167d44b190.sol#805-810
